order.yourRefundInformation: Your refund will be initiated after recieving the return packages. The amount will be refunded back to the payment method usedto place this order. item.name: Nike Women's Dry Tempo Shorts
item.shortDescription: The Nike Women's Dry Tempo Shorts are made of polyester Nike™ Dry fabric and have reflective details.
item.longDescription: Take your training to the next level when you wear the Nike Women's Dry Tempo Shorts. Stay dry and comfortable, thanks to the sweat-wicking Nike™ Dry fabric, and stash your music player in the internal audio pocket and listen to your tunes while you rack up the miles. Does your route take you into the night? No worries ? reflective details help keep you visible after dark.
